resources.string: enter email associated with your account above

Contractual Relationship
This mobile application (the "application") is operated by MgmtHaven LLC ("MgmtHaven") and its affiliates. These Terms of Use ("Terms") pertain to the access or use by you, an individual, from within the United States and its territories and possessions of applications, websites, content, products, and services. Please read the terms of use carefully before using the applications, and services developed by MgmtHaven. Your access and use validates that you agree to the terms of use presented by MgmtHaven. If you do not agree to the terms of use, you cannot access the application or utilize the services of MgmtHaven. MgmtHaven withholds the right to amend these terms at any time. Amendments will be effective upon MgmtHaven posting an updated version of such at this location or at an applicable location. Our collection and use of personal information can be found below 
The Services
Services includes the mobile platform that enables users to access applications provides by MgmtHaven and its affiliates to manage real estate. Unless authorized by MgmtHaven in a separate written agreement with you, the services are available solely for your personal non-commercial use. You acknowledge the MgmtHaven is not a property management firm, and does not take on the responsibility of managing properties for a company or individual. 
The License
Subject to your compliance with the terms of use, MgmtHaven grants you a limited, non-exclusive, non-revocable, non-transferable license to access our application on your personal mobile device.
The Ownership 
The Services and all rights therein are an shall remain property of MgmtHaven. The terms of use does not grant you any rights external of the limited use mentioned above. The use of MgmtHaven's logo, data, product or services names is prohibited without a written agreement from MgmtHaven. 
User Accounts 
In order to use most aspects of the Services, you must register for and maintain an active personal user Services account ("Account"). Account registration requires you to submit to MgmtHaven certain personal information, such as your name, address, mobile phone number, and properties owned. You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your Account, and you agree to maintain the security and secrecy of your Account username and password at all times. Unless otherwise permitted by Uber in writing, you may only possess one Account 
The Data 
MgmtHaven collects information you provide directly to us, such as when you create or modify your account, contact customer support, or otherwise communicate with us. This information may include: name, email, phone number, address, profile picture, payment method, warranty information, purchase receipts and invoices, delivery notes, and other information you choose to provide. We may also collect information about your mobile device, such as the hardware model, operating system and version, software and file names and versions, preferred language, unique device identifier, advertising identifiers, serial number, device motion information, and mobile network information. Your information may be used to communicate items that we think will be of interest to you, including information about products, services, promotions, news, and events of MgmtHaven and other companies, where permissible and according to local applicable laws.
